13 weeks and 22 weeks gestation. This vaccine is contraindicated during pregnancy.  
The list of drugs given in pregnancy and their US-FDA risk category is given in Table 1. 
Table 1 Commonly Used Drugs In Pregnancy and their Categories[18]. 
Drugs Category 
Analgesics and Antipyretic  
Acetaminophen B 
Phenacetin B 
Aspirin C 
Antiemetics
